mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.origin_name AS originName, p.content, p.price, p.image_url AS imageUrl, c.id AS cat_id, c.category_name AS cat_categoryName, c.parent_id AS cat_parentId, c.depth AS cat_depth, 1 AS isWished FROM Bg_Wishlist w LEFT JOIN Bg_Product p ON w.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN Bg_Category_product_mapping cpm ON p.id = cpm.product_id LEFT JOIN Bg_Interest_category c ON cpm.interest_category_id = c.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Bg_Wishlist WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
